TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Maa_Purut_ka_Masu, title = Maa_Purut_ka_Masu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maa_Purut_ka_Masu} }

S.FORM: Maa Purut ka Masu 小米變白腰文鳥 Masu Truku sbiyaw o mrana bi dagun, kingal buwax masu o skaan, snkaan o kingal liwas dagun ni mtuku bi uqun kingal ruwan sapah. Siida o ungat ka kuwi ni qbhni meekan uri.Kiya ni kingal ruwan sapah o mhuma kingal hnigan ni kingal seysay masu o uqun kingal hngkawas kingal ruwan sapah.Niqan kingal jiyax mtgeaguh eekan nhari ka kingal empadawi, asi na dagi liwas ka kingal kmux buwax masu, nangi na mnebawa do msbbitaw mspruq ka buwax masu ni "Pit" "Pit" msa wada maaqpuring purut skaya. Neungat ka purut han, pnaah nii kika niqan ka purut dni,miyah gmnama mkan tnukuy ni miyah mkan empkhada ka masu.Seejiq tnemasu do o mgsmay glawa. A saw bi ka seejiq empadawi.

Maa Porot ka Maso 小米變白腰文鳥 Maso Troko sbiyaw o mrana bi dagon, kingal bowax maso o skaan, snkaan o kingal liwas dagon ni mtoko bi oqon kingal rowan sapah. Siida o ongat ka kowi ni qbhni meekan ori.Kiya ni kingal rowan sapah o mhoma kingal hnigan ni kingal seysay maso o oqon kingal hngkawas kingal rowan sapah.Niqan kingal jiyax mtgeagoh eekan nhari ka kingal empadawi, asi na dagi liwas ka kingal kmox bowax maso, nangi na mnebawa do msbbitaw msproq ka bowax maso ni "Pit" "Pit" msa wada maaqporing porot skaya. Neongat ka porot han, pnaah nii kika niqan ka porot dni,miyah gmnama mkan tnokoy ni miyah mkan empkhada ka maso.Seejiq tnemaso do o mgsmay glawa. A saw bi ka seejiq empadawi.
